name: Modern_Twine_Curved-arm_Sofa
reviews: I love my new couch!! It's the perfect size for 2 or three people and is comfortable! Love the style of it too!
description: Classic yet relevant with a rich textured twine-colored upholstery and deep button tufting, this  modern sofa showcases curved arms with a broad beveled back. Supported by four espresso-finished hardwood feet, this gorgeous sofa is finished with reversible seat cushions and two matching throw pillows. Ideal for a mid-mod home, this sofa features no-mar foot glides that protect your hardwood floor from scratches. Its foam-filled cushions and broad back make this sofa comfortable for relaxing. Its twine-colored upholstery complements a broad range of decors, and the sofa's durable fabric promises to stand the test of time.Button tufting detail on sofa backDurable textured fabricTwo (2) pillows includedReversible seat cushionsNon-mar foot glidesSet includes: One (1) sofaMaterials: Fabric, foam, solid wood, plywoodFinish: EspressoUpholstery color: Twine coloredUpholstery fill: FoamSeat dimensions: 17 inches high x 23 inches deep x 54 inches wideDimensions: 70 inches wide x 30.5 inches deep x 30 inches highStyleModernMaterialFabric, Foam, WoodTypeSofaAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorTanFurniture PatternSolid
